/** Colors */
/** Font variables */
/** Mixins */
.media--type-podcast.media--view-mode-teaser-large { border: 1px solid #D6D7D9; margin-bottom: 2.1rem; }

@media (max-width: 575.98px) { .media--type-podcast.media--view-mode-teaser-large { flex-direction: column; } }

.media--type-podcast.media--view-mode-teaser-large .field--name-field-podcast-session-image { cursor: pointer; }

.media--type-podcast.media--view-mode-teaser-large .podcast-listen-text { background-color: #0071BC; color: #FFFFFF; cursor: pointer; font-family: "Lato Thin"; line-height: 2.92rem; text-align: center; transition: background-color 0.15s ease-in-out; width: 100%; }

.media--type-podcast.media--view-mode-teaser-large .podcast-listen-text:hover, .media--type-podcast.media--view-mode-teaser-large .podcast-listen-text:focus, .media--type-podcast.media--view-mode-teaser-large .podcast-listen-text.hover { background-color: #205493; }

.media--type-podcast.media--view-mode-teaser-large .podcast-listen-text.active { background-color: #0071BC; }

.media--type-podcast.media--view-mode-teaser-large .podcast-listen-text .podcast-listen-text-label { letter-spacing: 0.11rem; text-transform: uppercase; }

.media--type-podcast.media--view-mode-teaser-large .podcast-listen-text .podcast-listen-text-time { font-size: 0.875rem; }

.media--type-podcast.media--view-mode-teaser-large .podcast-listen-text-time { display: none; }

.media--type-podcast.media--view-mode-teaser-large .podcast-listen-text-time .podcast-time-duration:after { display: inline-block; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; text-rendering: auto; -webkit-font-smoothing: antialiased; font-family: 'Font Awesome 5 Free'; font-weight: 900; content: '\f028'; font-weight: 900; margin-left: 0.5rem; }

.media--type-podcast.media--view-mode-teaser-large .podcast-info-outer { padding: 1rem; }

.media--type-podcast.media--view-mode-teaser-large .podcast-info-outer .above-title { font-family: "Merriweather Bold"; font-size: 0.875rem; }

.media--type-podcast.media--view-mode-teaser-large .podcast-info-outer .above-title:before { display: inline-block; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; text-rendering: auto; -webkit-font-smoothing: antialiased; font-family: 'Font Awesome 5 Free'; font-weight: 900; content: '\f130'; font-weight: 900; margin-right: 0.5rem; }

.media--type-podcast.media--view-mode-teaser-large .podcast-info-outer h3 { margin: 0 0 1rem; }

.media--type-podcast.media--view-mode-teaser-large .podcast-info-outer h3 a { font-family: "Merriweather Bold"; font-size: 1.0625rem; color: #212121; }

.media--type-podcast.media--view-mode-teaser-large .podcast-info-outer .field--name-field-episode-description, .media--type-podcast.media--view-mode-teaser-large .podcast-info-outer .field--name-field-episode-description p { font-size: 0.9375rem; margin-bottom: 0; }

.media--type-podcast.media--view-mode-teaser-large .session-image-outer .field--name-field-podcast-session-image { position: relative; transition: background-color 150ms ease-in-out; }

.media--type-podcast.media--view-mode-teaser-large .session-image-outer .field--name-field-podcast-session-image:after { content: ''; position: absolute; display: block; background: url("/themes/custom/gao/img/playbutton.png"); top: 50%; margin-top: -38px; left: 50%; margin-left: -38px; height: 77px; width: 77px; }

.media--type-podcast.media--view-mode-teaser-large .session-image-outer .field--name-field-podcast-session-image.hover:after { background: url("/themes/custom/gao/img/playbutton-hover.png"); }

.media--type-podcast.media--view-mode-teaser-large .session-image-outer .field--name-field-podcast-session-image.player-active:after { background: url("/themes/custom/gao/img/playbutton-pause.png"); }

.media--type-podcast.media--view-mode-teaser-large img { transition: opacity 150ms ease-in-out; width: 100%; }

.media--type-podcast.media--view-mode-teaser-large .field--name-field-media-audio-file { display: none; }

@media screen and (max-width: 600px) { .media--view-mode-teaser-large { display: block; }
  .podcast-listen-text { background-color: #FFFFFF; color: #767676; cursor: pointer; letter-spacing: 0.11rem; line-height: 2.92rem; text-align: center; text-transform: uppercase; width: 100%; } }
